About.title: About Me
About.description: I am a software developer passionate about building applications. I enjoy working with React, TypeScript, and Java, and I am always eager to learn new technologies.

project1.title: Pixel Art
project1.description: A simple practice project for DOM manipulation.

project2.title: Portfolio
project2.description: The repository of this portfolio, built with React and TypeScript.

project3.title: Dri-Commerce
project3.description: An e-commerce project built with React, TypeScript, and CSS, using the Mercado Livre API. #DEPRECATED

project4.title: Users API
project4.description: A NestJS learning project focused on authentication, authorization, and user management with JWT and PostgreSQL.

Contact.title: Contact Me
Contact.description: Feel free to reach out to me on my social networks, or you can also access my resume <resume>here</resume>.

Timeline.title: Timeline
Timeline.description: Here is a summary of my professional and academic journey.

Bachelor's Degree in English Language an.tech: Bachelor's Degree in English Language and Literature
Bachelor's Degree in English Language an.note: UFRJ - Federal University of Rio de Janeiro

Career shift to Software Development.note: Enrolled in CS50 through Educar Foundation: Introduction to Computer Science from Harvard.

LIFE Empreendimentos.note: Responsible for customer service, managing spreadsheets in Excel and Google Sheets, and account auditing.

CIANDT.note: Currently working with React, TypeScript, NodeJS, and NestJS, focusing on software development and improving technical skills.
